import cv2
import os
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import tensorflow as tf

from tensorflow.keras.models import Sequential, Model
from tensorflow.keras.layers import Conv2D, MaxPooling2D, Flatten, Dense, Dropout, BatchNormalization, GlobalAveragePooling2D
from tensorflow.keras.callbacks import EarlyStopping, ModelCheckpoint

from keras_preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator
from keras.utils.np_utils import to_categorical
from keras.preprocessing.image import img_to_array

from sklearn.metrics import classification_report, accuracy_score
from sklearn.preprocessing import MultiLabelBinarizer, LabelBinarizer
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

from tensorflow.keras.applications import ResNet50

source.ca114bcf:
import plotly.graph_objects as go
colors = ['gold', 'mediumturquoise', 'darkorange', 'lightgreen']

label_counts = df['labels'].value_counts()
fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Pie(labels=label_counts.index,values=label_counts)])
fig.update_traces(hoverinfo='label+percent', textinfo='value', textfont_size=20,
                  marker=dict(colors=colors, line=dict(color='#000000', width=2)))
fig.update_layout(title='Labels distribution')
fig.show()
plt.savefig('labels1.png',transparent=True)
source.8b920f5e:
complex_leaf = train_df.loc[train_df['complex'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
frog_eye_leaf_spot = train_df.loc[train_df['frog_eye_leaf_spot'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
healthy = train_df.loc[train_df['healthy'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
powdery_mildew = train_df.loc[train_df['powdery_mildew'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
rust = train_df.loc[train_df['rust'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
scab = train_df.loc[train_df['scab'] == 1].iloc[:,0].tolist()
source.3354490f:
from PIL import Image
image_path = '../input/plant-pathology-2021-fgvc8/train_images/'
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12, 12))
for i in range(0,9):
        img_array = np.array(Image.open(image_path +healthy[i]))
        fig.add_subplot(3, 3, i+1) 
        plt.imshow(img_array)
